content.rendered:
Terms & Conditions for the Link King Language Learning App

Effective Date: December 8, 2024

Welcome to the Link King language learning app (the “App”), owned and managed by Jacob Miller (“I,” “me,” “my”). These Terms and Conditions (“Terms”) govern your use of the App, including all features, content, and services provided through it.

By accessing, downloading, or using the App, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, you must not use the App.

1. Ownership and Eligibility

  • The App is personally owned and managed by Jacob Miller, located at Cuilmore, Swinford, Co. Mayo, Ireland.
  • You must be at least 16 years old to use the App.
  • By using the App, you confirm that all information provided during registration is accurate and up-to-date.

2. License to Use the App

  • I grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, and revocable license to use the App for personal, non-commercial purposes.
  • You must not copy, modify, distribute, sell, or lease any part of the App, nor reverse engineer or attempt to extract the source code of the App.

3. User Accounts

  • You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
  • You must notify me immediately at info@linkoking.com if you suspect unauthorized use of your account.
  • I reserve the right to terminate or suspend accounts for violating these Terms or engaging in fraudulent, abusive, or illegal activities.

4. Subscriptions and Payments

  • Access to certain features of the App may require a subscription. By subscribing, you agree to pay all applicable fees and taxes.
  • Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled before the renewal date. Cancellation policies are detailed in the App.
  • Payment processing is handled by third-party providers, and I do not store payment information.

5. Content and Intellectual Property

  • All content, features, and design elements of the App, including text, graphics, logos, and software, are owned by me or my licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws.
  • You retain ownership of any content you upload or create within the App but grant me a non-exclusive, worldwide license to use, modify, and display that content for purposes related to the App.

6. Prohibited Conduct

You agree not to:

  • Use the App for any unlawful or fraudulent purposes.
  • Introduce viruses, malware, or other harmful software into the App.
  • Access or attempt to access another user’s account without permission.
  • Exploit the App for commercial purposes without my written consent.

7. Limitation of Liability

  • To the maximum extent permitted by law, I am not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of the App.
  • I do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation of the App and am not responsible for any loss of data or inability to access features.

8. Termination

  • I reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the App at any time, without notice, for violating these Terms or for any other reason deemed necessary.

9. Changes to the App or Terms

  • I may update the App or these Terms at any time. Continued use of the App after updates signifies your acceptance of the revised Terms.
  • Material changes will be communicated via the App or email.

10. Contact Information

For any questions or concerns about these Terms or the App, contact me:

  • Email: info@linkoking.com
  • Address: Cuilmore, Swinford, Co. Mayo, Ireland

Terms and Conditions for Link-King.com Website

Effective Date: December 8, 2024

Welcome to Link-King.com (the “Website”), owned and managed by Jacob Miller (“I,” “me,” “my”). These Terms and Conditions (“Terms”) govern your access and use of the Website, including any content, features, or services provided through it.

By accessing or using the Website, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, you must not use the Website.

1. Use of the Website

  • The Website is intended to promote the Link King language learning app and provide related information.
  • You agree to use the Website only for lawful purposes and in a manner that does not infringe on the rights of others or restrict their use and enjoyment of the Website.

2. Intellectual Property

  • All content on the Website, including text, images, logos, and software, is owned by me or my licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws.
  • You may not copy, distribute, modify, or use any content from the Website without prior written consent.

3. Third-Party Links

  • The Website may contain links to third-party websites. I am not responsible for the content, policies, or practices of third-party websites and encourage you to review their terms and policies.

4. User Submissions

  • By submitting content or feedback through the Website, you grant me a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to use, modify, and display that content for promotional or operational purposes.
  • You must not submit any unlawful, harmful, or infringing content.

5. Limitation of Liability

  • To the fullest extent permitted by law, I am not liable for any damages resulting from your use of the Website, including errors, interruptions, or data loss.
  • I do not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of content provided on the Website.

6. Privacy

  • My use of your personal data is governed by the Privacy Policy, which complies with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

7. Changes to the Website or Terms

  • I may update the Website or these Terms at any time. Continued use of the Website after updates signifies your acceptance of the revised Terms.
  • Material changes will be communicated through the Website or email.

8. Governing Law

  • These Terms are governed by the laws of Ireland. Any disputes arising from the use of the Website shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Ireland.

9. Contact Information

For any questions or concerns about these Terms or the Website, contact me:

  • Email: info@linkoking.com
  • Address: Cuilmore, Swinford, Co. Mayo, Ireland

<meta name="description" content="Link-King is a language learning app, designed to help advanced learners rapidly improve their vocabulary in a new language.
